name: PeerMe MultiSig: Check Signed

title.de: Prüfen ob Benutzer Vorschlag unterzeichnet hat

description: Check if a specific user has signed a MultiSig proposal. Use this to verify whether a board member has already approved a specific proposal before asking them to sign.

inputs.name: User Address

description.de: Die Wallet-Adresse, die geprüft werden soll.

inputs.bot: Default to the user's own wallet address unless they specify someone else.

inputs.name: Action ID

description.en: The ID of the proposal to check.
description.de: Die ID des zu prüfenden Vorschlags.

inputs.bot: If the user hasn't specified an action ID, first run 'Get Pending Actions' to show what's available.
